title: Recent Economic Developments, the Productive Potential of the Economy, and Monetary Policy
content: Potential GDP is lower  9  12,000  13,000  14,000  15,000  16,000  17,000  18,000  19,000  20,000  20 00  20 01  20 02  20 03  20 04  20 05  20 06  20 07  20 08  20 09  20 10  20 11  20 12  20 13  20 14  20 15  Actual and Potential GDP (CBO  estimates, billions of 2009 dollars)  Actual 2016 potential 2007 potential  Level of potential GDP in  2015 is 10% lower than  projected in 2007  Potential GDP growth,  2005-15: In 2007:    2.8% Now:         2.0%  Figure 7  Note:  GDP is gross domestic product; CBO is Congressional Budget Office. Source: Congressional Budget Office, Budget and Economic Outlook and Updates, “Potential GDP and Underlying Inputs,” data for January 2016 and January 2007,  https://www.cbo.gov/about/products/budget_economic_data; Bureau of Economic Analysis.
